title: Side Effects of Being a Black Intellectual (with Marc Lamont Hill)
description:
This week, author, professor, and pundit Marc Lamont Hill joins us to illuminate the realities and sometimes contradictions of being smart, funny, and Black.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
